medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days ago with worsening abdominal pain. The patient was seen in the emergency department for pelvic pain 2 days prior, cleared from a GYN standpoint, and sent home. The pain progressed in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and was accompanied by fever (max T 101.0). The patient endorsed nausea, had diarrhea as the last bowel movement yesterday, and normal urination.
